title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 677.1 - Maintenance of records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 677.1 - Maintenance of records

State Regulations

Local social services departments shall maintain personnel
records on such matters and in such form as may be prescribed from time to time
by the New York State Department of Social Services. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
677.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
